channel.title: Edited Scripts board
channel.description: There should be a section for edited scripts. The edited script should have, in the next post of that topic, a permission signature, clarifying that the scripter has given the editor permission to edit his / her script.

item.title: Edited Scripts board
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

There should be a section for edited scripts. The edited script should have, in the next post of that topic, a permission signature, clarifying that the scripter has given the editor permission to edit his / her script.

Read full topic
